root.name: Double Clutch
root.description: GameplayPicking one of four drivers, each with different strengths and weaknesses, the player sets off to finish first on not one, not two, but three different tracks. Each race consists of three laps against 6 AI drivers (or an additional second player). After finishing, the prize money can be spend on upgrading the car.The three tracks are being driven multiple times in different weather conditions: dry, rain and snow. A damage meter shows the state the car is in and drops when running into other drivers or when crashing off course.Playable driversTodd Wheeler "Power is all you need."Lance Quick "Clutch the early lead!"Pam Wilder "Can't win if you crash."Joe Thunder "Don't spin your wheels."
